GOP leaders will decided whether the bill moves to Appropriations committee or directly to the House floor, where it is expected to pass. The GOP-controlled Senate also is likely to pass it. have also made commitments to participate. Other invited speakers include former Arkansas Governor Mike Huckabee , Indiana Governor Mitch Daniels , South Dakota Senator John Thune , former Alaska Governor Sarah Palin , Mississippi Governor Haley Barbour , and Indiana Representative Mike Pence . Iowans play a vital role in hosting the first-in-the-nation presidential caucus, and it is our privilege to offer this Presidential Lecture Series in order to provide our very influential base an opportunity to gain insight into our political process, said Bob Vander Plaats , president and CEO of The FAMiLY LEADER. "Our base is serious about its role in the political process and the Presidential Lecture Series is a focused strategy to facilitate meaningful exposure to our constituents.

Mike Pence Paul Ryan , a leading conservative voice on fiscal matters, acknowledged that the Barack Obama entered office facing a difficult economic situation, but he contended that his policies have only exacerbated the problem. The facts are clear: Since taking office, Barack Obama has signed into law spending increases of nearly 25 percent for domestic government agencies-- an 84 percent increase when you include the failed stimulus. All of this new government spending was sold as` investment.' Yet after two years, the unemployment rate remains above 9 percent and government has added over$ 3 trillion to our debt, said Mike Pence Paul Ryan . Much like the Barack Obama 's address, Mike Pence Paul Ryan 's speech was more focused on vision than policy specifics. Still, the differences were clear.
